title: Single (70-minute) Clarity Call
description: Rapid diagnosis, tool recommendations tailored to your goals, and a one-page action sheet.
includes: Tool recommendations: popular, no-code, or deep tech
One-page action sheet with next steps

title: Starter (30 days)
description: Pick your tools, build small projects, and gain confidence with weekly milestones.
includes: Choose your track: popular AI, no-code, or developer tools

title: Growth (90 days / 4 sessions)
description: Deeper mentorship, hands-on projects with tools you choose, KPIs, and an ROI review.
includes: Build 3-5 real projects with your chosen tools
Full tool stack: from n8n & Lovable to Vertex AI & Genkit
